claw.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a sharp curved nail on an animal, bird, or some insects
claw.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The cat dug his claws into my leg.
claw.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the curved end of a tool or machine, used for lifting things
claw.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to tear or pull at something, using claws or your fingers
claw.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The cat keeps clawing at the rug.
